name: Keep LD Servers Alive
description:
Take on the role of Mike, the server admin for Ludum Dare!

How to Play:

- Move around world by moving mouse to edge of the screen

- Zoom with Scroll Wheel

- Games appear around the globe as red dots

- Click on the green data uplink sphere to move it and click again to place it

- Collect and process more games to earn money

- Click on the server to spend your money on upgrades

- Didn't have time for real win/lose conditions so just have fun playing around and upgrading! Enjoy!
